scripts.build: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/build.ts
scripts.start: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json INSPECT_MAIN=9365 INSPECT_RENDERER=9366 node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/start.ts
scripts.start:debug: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json INSPECT_MAIN=9365 INSPECT_RENDERER=9366 node --inspect-brk=9488 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/start.ts
scripts.pack: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/pack.ts
